name: Solitaire Heaven - TriPeaks
description:
Travel the fantasy world, discover new worlds, and have fun with relaxing gameplay in Solitaire Heaven. Enjoy the TriPeaks solitaire card game created especially for you. Free Tripeaks Solitaire game like you've never played before!

Features:
- Wild game-changing cards, with magical effects will help you on the journey!
- Colorful graphics with a vibrant fantasy theme!
- Hundreds of different challenging levels!

Wave your boredom goodbye with Solitaire Heaven! Download, Play, and Win!
